original_text: When Simon saw that the Spirit was given at the laying on of the apostles’ hands, he offered them money
korean_text: 시몬이 사도들의 안수로 성령 받는 것을 보고 돈을 드려

sentences.original_text: When Simon saw that the Spirit was given
sentences.korean_translation: 시몬이 성령이 주어지는 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: at the laying on of the apostles' hands
